00021 class RadioButtonModel : public Model {
00022     public:
00023         typedef Model Base;
00024 
00025         // Constructor of the radiobutton-model.
00026         RadioButtonModel(const WCHAR *caption = 0, BOOLEAN state = 0) : 
00027             m_caption(caption), m_state(state)  {};
00028 
00029         //
00030         void SetCaption(const WCHAR *caption) { m_caption = caption; };
00031 
00032         //
00033         const WCHAR* GetCaption() const { return m_caption; };
00034 
00035         //
00036         void SetState(BOOLEAN state) { m_state = state; };
00037 
00038         //      
00039         BOOLEAN GetState() const { return m_state; };
00040 
00041     private:
00042         const WCHAR     *m_caption;
00043         BOOLEAN         m_state;
00044 };

00047 class RadioButtonView : public View {
00048     typedef View Base;
00049 
00050     public:
00051         RadioButtonView();
00052         // Constructor of the radiobutton-view.
00053         RadioButtonView(XYDIM item_height,
00054                                XYDIM left_gap,
00055                                XYDIM middle_gap) :
00056                     Base(-1, item_height),
00057                     m_item_height(item_height),
00058                     m_left_gap(left_gap),
00059                     m_middle_gap(middle_gap) {};
00060 
00061         virtual ~RadioButtonView() {}
00062 
00063         //
00064         void SetItemHeight(XYDIM item_height) { m_item_height = item_height; };
00065 
00066         //
00067         XYDIM GetItemHeight() { return m_item_height; };
00068 
00069         //
00070         void SetLeftGap(XYDIM left_gap) { m_left_gap = left_gap; };
00071 
00072         //
00073         XYDIM GetLeftGap() const { return m_left_gap; };
00074 
00075         //
00076         void SetMiddleGap(XYDIM middle_gap) { m_middle_gap = middle_gap; };
00077 
00078         //
00079         XYDIM GetMiddleGap() const { return m_middle_gap; };
00080 
00082         virtual void Draw(const Component &component, DeviceContext *dc, const Rect &repaint_rect) const;
00083 
00085         virtual void DrawShifted(const Rect &shift_rect, const Model &abstract_model, DeviceContext *dc,  const Rect &repaint_rect) const;
00086

00089         virtual void DrawRadioButton(const RadioButtonModel &model, DeviceContext *dc, const Rect &repaint_rect) const = 0;
